import axios from 'axios'; import React from 'react'; import { getId } from '../configstore'; export function Profile() { let url = 'http://127.0.0.1:5789/people/'; url = url + getId().id; let user = { id: getId().id, nickname: "", username: "", password: "", } axios.get(url) .then(response => { user = response.data; }); return (








) }
